mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_product_category (pcategory, pname, ptype, description, calorie, caffeine, sugars, protein, fat, sodium, imagefile) VALUES (#{pcategory}, #{pname}, #{ptype}, #{description}, #{calorie}, #{caffeine}, #{sugars}, #{protein}, #{fat}, #{sodium}, #{imagefile})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product_category SET pname = #{pname}, ptype = #{ptype}, description = #{description}, calorie = #{calorie}, caffeine = #{caffeine}, sugars = #{sugars}, protein = #{protein}, fat = #{fat}, sodium = #{sodium}, imagefile = #{imagefile}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE pcategory = #{pcategory}
